headline: Gov. DeWine gives shoutout to 3-year-old awaiting heart transplant at Cincinnati Children's
author: WLWT Digital Staff
sentences: Three-year-old Sammy Jones is currently awaiting a heart transplant at Cincinnati Children's Hospital.
On Friday, DeWine replied to a tweet of Sammy saying, "Fran and I are rooting for you, buddy!
Sammy's family is actually Raiders fans but say Cincinnati is obviously rubbing off on them.
Mike DeWine gave a shoutout to one of the Bengals' littlest fans Friday morning.
You are in good hands at Cincinnati Children's."
